changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `device` ( `id` SERIAL, `serial_number` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, `device_type_id` BIGINT, `device_model_id` BIGINT, `observation_point_id` BIGINT, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `observation_point` ( `id` SERIAL, `short_name` VARCHAR(10), `full_name` VARCHAR(255), `latitude` FLOAT(7, 4), `longitude` FLOAT(7, 4), `high` FLOAT, PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `sensor` ( `number` TINYINT, `device_id` BIGINT, `name` VARCHAR(255), `measure_unit_id` BIGINT, PRIMARY KEY (`device_id`, `number`), UNIQUE KEY `device_id` (`device_id`, `number`) );
